SELECT A.* ,IFNULL(B.CNT, 0) COURSE_CNT ,DATE_FORMAT(IFNULL(A.UPDATE_DATE, A.CREATE_DATE), '%y.%m.%d %H:%i') LAST_UPDATE_DATE ,IFNULL(U2.USER_NAME, U1.USER_NAME) LAST_UPDATE_USER ,'N' NEW_FLAG FROM USER A LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT USER_ID, COUNT(*) CNT FROM COURSE_REGISTER GROUP BY USER_ID ) B ON B.USER_ID = A.USER_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN USER U1 ON A.CREATE_USER = U1.USER_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN USER U2 ON A.UPDATE_USER = U2.USER_ID WHERE 1 = 1
AND UPPER(A.USER_ID) LIKE CONCAT('%',UPPER(#{SEARCH_STR}),'%')
AND UPPER(A.USER_NAME) LIKE CONCAT('%',UPPER(#{SEARCH_STR}),'%')
AND UPPER(A.EMAIL) LIKE CONCAT('%',UPPER(#{SEARCH_STR}),'%')
AND UPPER(A.MOBILE) LIKE CONCAT('%',UPPER(#{SEARCH_STR}),'%')
AND A.ADMIN_YN IN ('A','M','C')
AND A.TEACHER_YN = 'Y'
AND A.TUTOR_YN = 'Y'
AND A.ADMIN_YN = 'N' AND A.TEACHER_YN = 'N' AND A.TUTOR_YN = 'N'
ORDER BY USER_NAME
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER(USER_ID, USER_NAME, EMAIL, USER_PASSWORD, HOME_ZIPCODE, HOME_ADDR, HOME_TEL, MOBILE, JOB, COMP_CD, RETIRED_YN, ADMIN_YN, TEACHER_YN, TUTOR_YN, SEX,BIRTH_DAY, CERTIFICATION_YN,CERTIFICATION_KEY, BANK, ACC_NUM, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_USER) VALUES (#{USER_ID},#{USER_NAME},#{EMAIL},PASSWORD(#{USER_PASSWORD}), #{HOME_ZIPCODE},#{HOME_ADDR},#{HOME_TEL},#{MOBILE},#{JOB}, #{COMP_CD},'N', #{ADMIN_YN},#{TEACHER_YN},#{TUTOR_YN}, #{SEX},#{BIRTH_DAY}, 'Y', '', #{BANK},#{ACC_NUM}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{SESSION_USER_ID})
mapper.update: UPDATE USER SET USER_NAME = #{USER_NAME}, EMAIL = #{EMAIL}, HOME_ZIPCODE = #{HOME_ZIPCODE}, HOME_ADDR = #{HOME_ADDR}, HOME_TEL = #{HOME_TEL}, MOBILE = #{MOBILE}, JOB = #{JOB}, COMP_CD = #{COMP_CD}, SEX = #{SEX}, BIRTH_DAY = #{BIRTH_DAY}, ADMIN_YN = #{ADMIN_YN}, TEACHER_YN = #{TEACHER_YN}, TUTOR_YN = #{TUTOR_YN}, BANK = #{BANK}, ACC_NUM = #{ACC_NUM}, UPDATE_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, UPDATE_USER = #{SESSION_USER_ID} WHERE USER_ID = #{USER_ID}
UPDATE USER SET USER_PASSWORD = PASSWORD(#{USER_PASSWORD}), UPDATE_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE USER_ID = #{USER_ID}
UPDATE USER SET CERTIFICATION_KEY = #{CERTIFICATION_KEY}, CERTIFICATION_YN = 'N', UPDATE_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE USER_ID = #{USER_ID}
